universum.studios.android.preference

Class PreferencesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.preference.PreferencesManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SharedPreferencesFacade, SharedPreferencesProvider

    public class PreferencesManager
extends Object
implements SharedPreferencesFacade, SharedPreferencesProvider
    Manager which implements SharedPreferencesFacade along with SharedPreferencesProvider in order to provide a simple API for putting and obtaining of values persisted within SharedPreferences.

    Shared preferences

    The PreferencesManager is closely associated with SharedPreference. Any implementation of SharedPreference class may be used to represent a concrete preference value to be persisted in shared preferences. Methods listed below may be used to put, get or remove a desired shared preference into or from preferences managed by the preferences manager:
    • putPreference(SharedPreference, Object)
    • getPreference(SharedPreference)
    • containsPreference(SharedPreference)
    • removePreference(SharedPreference)

    Sample implementation

     public final class AppPreferences extends PreferencesManager {

      private static final String KEY_PREFIX = BuildConfig.APPLICATION_ID = ".PREFERENCE.";
      private static final String KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH = KEY_PREFIX + "AppFirstLaunch";

      public AppPreferences(@NonNull Context context) {
          super(context);
      }

      public void setAppFirstLaunch(boolean firstLaunch) {
          putBoolean(KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH, firstLaunch);
      }

      public boolean isAppFirstLaunch() {
          return getBoolean(KEY_APP_FIRST_LAUNCH, true);
      }
 }
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Constructor Detail

      • PreferencesManager

        public PreferencesManager(@NonNull
                          Context context)
        Creates a new instance of PreferencesManager with the specified context.

        Manager will be created with default name for shared preferences obtained via SharedPreferencesPolicy.defaultPreferencesName(Context) and mode set to SharedPreferencesPolicy.MODE_PRIVATE.

        Parameters:
        context - Context that is used to obtain instance of SharedPreferences for the new manager via Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int) for the name and mode specified via setSharedPreferencesName(String) and setSharedPreferencesMode(int).

      • putPreference

        public final <T> boolean putPreference(@NonNull
                                       SharedPreference<T> preference,
                                       @Nullable
                                       T value)
        Persists the given value for the specified preference into SharedPreferences that are managed by this manager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the value associated with the preference.
        Parameters:
        preference - Preference for which to persist the value.
        value - The value to be persisted.
        Returns:
        True if put has been successful, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getPreference(SharedPreference), containsPreference(SharedPreference), removePreference(SharedPreference), SharedPreference.updateValue(Object), SharedPreference.putIntoPreferences(SharedPreferences)

      • getPreference

        @Nullable
public final <T> T getPreference(@NonNull
                                            SharedPreference<T> preference)
        Obtains the value for the given preference from SharedPreferences that are managed by this manager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the value associated with the preference.
        Parameters:
        preference - Preference for which to obtain its associated value.
        Returns:
        Value associated with the preference. May be null if there is no value persisted for the preference yet.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object), contains(String), SharedPreference.getFromPreferences(SharedPreferences)

      • containsPreference

        public final boolean containsPreference(@NonNull
                                        SharedPreference preference)
        Checks whether there is value associated with the specified preference contained within SharedPreferences that are managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        preference - The desired preference of which value's presence to check.
        Returns:
        True if there is value contained for key of the specified preference, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object), getPreference(SharedPreference), removePreference(SharedPreference)

      • removePreference

        public final boolean removePreference(@NonNull
                                      SharedPreference preference)
        Removes a value for the specified preference from SharedPreferences that are managed by this manager.
        Parameters:
        preference - The preference for which to remove its associated value.
        Returns:
        True if removal has been successful, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        putPreference(SharedPreference, Object), getPreference(SharedPreference), containsPreference(SharedPreference)
